title: Milk Powder queues are back
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); People in several areas were seen queuing up on Wednesday (25) to purchase milk powder.
People said that the Milk Powder sales outlet owners said that on Wednesday (25) milk powder will be sold at the shop but the shop was closed.
People were waiting in queue since morning but NO sales were made during the entire day.
